page.title: Sharps origin of the Gre Tongue

revision.text: Possibly: The origin and structure of the Greek tongue. In a series of letters addressed to a young nobleman. By Gregory Sharpe. (London : printed by Richardson and Clark and sold by W. Sandby, T.Longman and J. Dodsley, 1767). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b1307090~S1
